summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad's Restorative Hydro-Hyaluronic Moisture Cream is a luxurious formula that smooths and plumps skin for 24 hours of intense hydration with continued use.
details: DetailsResearch ResultsImmediately smooths and plumps with 24 hours of intense hydration, with continuous use*Restores the skin barrier in just 1 useSkin looks more radiant and youthful, improving the look of fine lines and wrinkles within 2 weeks**Technology-tested after 4 weeks of continuous useKey IngredientsAdvanced Hydro-Hyaluronic Technology: hyaluronic acid at various multi-molecular weights penetrates deep into skin for instant and lasting hydrationNourishing coconut extract: helps further guard against water lossShe butter and sunflower oil: uniquely blended mix seals in long-lasting moistureFormulated WithoutParabens,Â sulfates, phthalates, gluten, mineral oil, formaldehyde, petrolatum, alcohol, animal-derived ingredientsItem 2631726How To UseTo Use: AM and PMMassage evenly over face, neck and chest. Follow with a sunscreen during the day.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Trimethylolpropane Tricaprylate/Tricaprate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isopentyldiol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Beta-Glucan, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Allantoin, Bisabolol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Polyisobutene, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, 1,2-Hexanediol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Glucose, Sorbitan Oleate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Glucosamine HCl, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Phenethyl Alcohol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To Use: AM and PMMassage evenly over face, neck and chest. Follow with a sunscreen during the day.

reviews.headline: Awful
reviews.comments: I was a long time user of the hyrdo dynamic ultimate mosturizer, and thought it was a fantastic product. Murad reformulated it and they claim is the same. It is not. There is a weird smell to it and it broke out my skin. It also caused my eyes to water. So disappointed.

reviews.headline: Why fix something that isn't broken?
reviews.comments: I've been using the previous version of this product for 9 years. They say this is the same product just rebranded but it's not. It has a strange smell and the container is cheaply made! Please please please bring back the old product!!

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: I have dry/sensitive skin and decided to try this moisturizer out as my skin was super dry during winter. I love how this moisturizer sinks into my skin and the way my skin feels in the morning. I will mention that I was also applying a hyaluronic acid serum before this murad moisturizer and it seemed to cause a drying reaction on my face as this murad moisturizer has hyaluronic acid in it already so I discontinued the hyaluronic acid serum. The dryness resolved. This was also amazing to put on when I accidentally got sunburnt on my fwce and I feel like it helped rehydrate my skin back to life and heal the sunburn. I plan to rebuy this when i run out ðŸ’œ

reviews.headline: Not my favorite.
reviews.comments: This is a very thick moisturizer that sits on my skin. I don't feel like it absorbs into my skin as well as I would like.

reviews.headline: Not my favorite.
reviews.comments: This is a very thick moisturizer that sits on my skin. I don't feel like it absorbs into my skin as well as I would like.

reviews.headline: This is the best of the best!
reviews.comments: I've tried every high-line product out there for dry skin and had no luck until I got turned onto this moisturizer!  It's a miracle and I woke up with skin as soft as silk!  I finally found a winner and I will never look further now!  Also, it scanned 100% excellent on the Yuka app which means it's a clean beauty product with no yucky ingredients in it!  So it's definitely a win win!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This is a wonderful moisturizer! It has higher levels of AHA, so if you have senstive skin, you might have to mix with another moisturizer until you get used to it. It makes my 40 year old skin that is prone to redness and discoloration look smooth and young. Really reduces my redness. Lasts all day. Not oily

reviews.headline: The Best
reviews.comments: I am a 60+ woman with sensitive skin. I did not detect any bad odors.  This is the vest moisturizer I've ever used. Plumps my skin. Absorbs well. Not sticky or oily. Holy Grail found.    :)

reviews.headline: Smells horrible
reviews.comments: This is an okay cream and im sure it works well, but it smells horrible. It smells like petroleum. I usually like products with no scent because i have sensitive skin, but this was something in couldn't get past. It's unfortunate because i love Murad products.

reviews.headline: Wake up to refreshed skin
reviews.comments: I received a sample size as a free gift with minimum purchase and I am so very grateful! I've tried Murad products and to me they always fell short.  But this, this was way better than I could have imagined.  I used it as the last step in my skincare routine at night and woke up looking well rested and refreshed.  My skin felt bouncy, velvety and hydrated.  No signs of oiliness.  Will definitely be purchasing a jar to see how it does with continuous longer term use.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have dry/sensitive skin and decided to try this moisturizer out as my skin was super dry during winter. I love how this moisturizer sinks into my skin and the way my skin feels in the morning. I will mention that I was also applying a hyaluronic acid serum before this murad moisturizer and it seemed to cause a drying reaction on my face as this murad moisturizer has hyaluronic acid in it already so I discontinued the hyaluronic acid serum. The dryness resolved. This was also amazing to put on when I accidentally got sunburnt on my fwce and I feel like it helped rehydrate my skin back to life and heal the sunburn. I plan to rebuy this when i run out ðŸ’œ
